query: mutation createPricingMatrix($command: CreatePricingMatrixCommandInput!) {  createPricingMatrix(command: $command) {  ...pricingMatrix  __typename  } }  fragment pricingMatrix on PricingMatrix {  reference  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  body {  ...pricingBody  __typename  }  sitting {  ...pricingSitting  __typename  }  __typename }  fragment pricingBody on Body {  reference  shortName  name  __typename }  fragment pricingSitting on Sitting {  reference  name  startDate  endDate  __typename }
